brewery.brewery_description:
"Bitburger has been brewing according to the German purity law with the greatest care, highest quality and best raw ingredients for over 200 years.

Bitburger’s certified hops grow right in our neighborhood, in Holsthum close to Bitburg in the Southern Eifel National Park which, together with hops from Hallertau give our Bitburger Premium Pils its slightly tangy hops taste. The unmistakable Bitburger quality and unique taste of our beer develops in combination with our natural yeast and high-quality, deeply sourced water from the Bitburger Triassic depression as well as malt from the best brewing barley. Germany’s most popular draft beer is served in more than 50,000 bars, restaurants and pubs in over 70 countries worldwide. Whatever the country, the well-loved slogan “Bitte ein Bit” is immediately recognizable. For beer connoisseurs a slogan which is inseparably linked to quality, unique taste and an unmistakable drinking experience."

beer.beer_description: Our straw-coloured pilsner is crystal-clear and perfectly hopped, boasting a light taste and a lasting foam head with extra-fine bubbles. This all combines for a moment of pure pilsner enjoyment.

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 75 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 16!

What's better than enjoying a beer outside with food, music, games all in an enjoyable atmosphere? We couldn't think of anything. That's a beer at 10 different venues with the category of Beer Garden. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Had my first one of these in the 90's as an airman. How have I never checked this in??

user.bio: Trade beers. Share knowledge. Talk shit. Let's do it.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 30 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 7!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 10 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: A unique flavor, starts to me as a bitter, finishes with the taste of honey. It’s a satisfying beer with a good middle of the road feel. Could have a good few of these. First tasted it visiting my grandpa and always caught my eye since.

beer.beer_description: Our straw-coloured pilsner is crystal-clear and perfectly hopped, boasting a light taste and a lasting foam head with extra-fine bubbles. This all combines for a moment of pure pilsner enjoyment.
Our straw-coloured pilsner is crystal-clear and perfectly hopped, boasting a light taste and a lasting foam head with extra-fine bubbles. This all combines for a moment of pure pilsner enjoyment.

Bitburger Winterbock is a pale bock beer refined with Bitburger Certified Seal Hops and aromatic Callista hops. The first sip is mild and fruity, revealing an intense, pleasantly rich malt sweetness. The fine bitterness from the hops is a well-balanced accompaniment, before finishing with a pleasant warmth on the palate.

The refreshingly different taste of Bitburger Radler: we mix Bitburger Premium Pils with sparkling lemonade, without any artificial additives, to make an incomparable, sparkling-fresh beverage that’s not too sweet.

The rich, complex flavor of this well-balanced beer does not betray its total lack of alcohol. Abundant vitamins and an isotonic nature make this an ideal beverage after sporting activities. Fresh fruit flavors evoking ripe summer apples are counterbalanced with delicately bitter herbs followed by a hint of malty sweetness, which pleasantly fades

Our Eifelbräu Helles Landbier offers a delightful and freshly spiced taste. With its light-golden color, it is enhanced by a second hop addition using the 'Perle' and 'Tradition' hop varieties, and refined with Bitburger Siegelhops.

The fine-tuned mix of Hallertau and Bitburger Certified Seal Hops, combined with the fruity and aromatic Ariana hops, give the Maibock its refreshing, fruity, and smooth character. At first sip, there are fine floral notes of pineapple, citrus, and peach, which are harmoniously rounded out with a subtle sweetness from the malt.

A finely malty, mild Kellerbier with an amber character. The initial impression on the palate is of a light body combined with a refreshing liveliness, giving way to a well-balanced interplay of elegant malt and caramel notes complemented by a pleasant bitterness followed by a graceful finish.

Our brewmasters have created a German Festbier to enjoy the traditional German beer festival atmosphere. It is a tasty, full-bodied and delicately malty-mild seasonal speciality. A crisp and full-bodied mouthfeel brings out a variety of malty flavors like roasted nuts and bread with a well-balanced sweetness of raisins and dried fruits. It finishes with a light, yet lingering bitterness that is not overwhelming and plays well with the perceptible higher alcohol.
Full-flavoured and completely alcohol-free: naturally brewed following German Beer Purity laws, Bitburger Drive 0,0% Alcohol-free has an unmatched taste.
Fruity and full-bodied on the palate, there is a balanced interplay of harmoniously integrated hop notes and a pleasant bitterness that fades gently on the palate.

Sparkling-fresh, vitamin-rich, and isotonic, and absolutely alcohol-free. Bitburger Radler 0,0% Alcohol-free provides perfect refreshment during or after sport – a truly satisfying alcohol-free beverage!
40 % Bitburger Premium Pils and 60 % naturally cloudy lemonade give this beer mix its refreshing flavour of sun-ripened, juicy lemons – with only 1.9 % alcohol.
Full-flavoured and completely alcohol-free: naturally brewed following German Beer Purity laws, Bitburger 0,0% Herb has an unmatched taste.

A full-bodied, hoppy 5.1% ABV beer with fine malt – and yet no gluten at all. Our gluten-free lager is refined with the best Bitburger Certified Seal Hops. It matures and is lagered for multiple weeks on end. After that, the gluten is removed from the beer using a special method. This is what makes beer taste good, even without gluten.

Pilsner and grapefruit – a unique combination: nuanced, harmonious, light and refreshing. Full of vitamins with a refreshing flavor, this beverage fits perfectly into an active lifestyle. The flavor of juicy grapefruit commingles with a light malty sweetness and a fine hoppiness; refreshing and pleasantly  effervescent with a tangy citrus flavor.

A full-bodied Radler rich with notes of fruit and possessing a pleasant sweetness. A full mouthfeel and harmonious overall impression conveys fruit flavors, chief among them, sun-ripened, juicy lemons.
A calorie and alcohol-reduced beer with the typical subtly bitter and hop-forward taste of Bitburger Premium beers.

Our unfiltered Premium Pils, naturally cloudy and with all the goodness of hops and malt. Smooth on the palate with a touch of malty sweetness, which is perfected by a quintessentially Bitburger note of hops to give Bitburger Unfiltered a fresh, ever-so-slightly bitter taste.

Fruity-refreshing lemon taste, and it's gluten-free. Bitburger Fassbrause naturtrüb Zitrone contributes to the normal functioning of the immune system due to the vitamins C, B6, and B12 it contains, making it the ideal alternative to classic lemonade.

Fruity-refreshing orange taste, and it's gluten-free. Bitburger Fassbrause naturtrüb Orange contributes to the normal functioning of the immune system due to the vitamins C, B6, and B12 it contains, making it the ideal alternative to classic lemonade.

"
Brewed with freshly harvested Cascade hops, our Bitburger Grünhopfenbier delights with a grassy-green hop aroma."
